'''v0.12.1 alpha build 2''' is the second build version released for [[Pocket Edition v0.12.1 alpha|v0.12.1]].

== Changes ==
* Added tame button for [[ocelot]]s
* Breaking [[Wheat Seeds|crops]] will now always drop [[Wheat Seeds|seed]]s
* Made the flight controls a little bit smaller
* [[Snow Golem]]s now spawn with a wearing [[pumpkin]]

== Fixes ==
{{Fixes|project=MCPE|fixedin=0.12.1 Beta 2|otherissuescount=13
|;From released versions before 0.12.1
|MCPE-8826|Chunks near to and of mushroom island biomes do not generate
|MCPE-9012|In multiplayer, the second player can't jump into the water without damage
|;From the previous development version
|MCPE-9320|Taming Ocelots no tame button
|MCPE-9340|Snow Golem bug 
|MCPE-9355|Crash at the opening on Galaxy Tab
|MCPE-9768|iOS not using the right sounds
}}
'''Other'''
* Fixed crash when opening controller screen
* Fixed a crash happening after waiting a long time in snowy [[biome]]s
* Fixed many [[multiplayer]] bugs
* [[Sprinting]] doesn't stop if strafing left or right
* Can now pull [[squid]] with [[fishing rod]]s
* [[Weather]] now resumes correctly after suspending the app
* The [[nether portal|portal]] effect now plays when stepping inside a portal
* [[Snowball]]s don't change color anymore at random
* [[Magma cube]]s correctly jump in multiplayer
* Fixed being able to move the character while a menu screen is open
* Fixed not being able to exit the Options screen with Back when switching to touch inputs
* [[Grass]] picked up with [[Silk Touch]] is now correct
* Can now place [[item]]s in the second [[anvil]] slot</onlyinclude>
